com.taobao.datax.common.plugin
接口 LineSender

所有已知实现类：
BufferedLineExchanger, LineExchanger
public interface LineSender

DataX use Storage to help Reader and Writer to exchange data,s Reader use LineSender to put data into Storage.

另请参见：
LineReceiver, BufferedLineExchanger

方法摘要
 Line createLine()
          Construct one Line of data in Storage which will be used to exchange data.
 boolean fakeSendToWriter(int lineLength)
          For test
 void flush()
          Flush data in buffer (if exists) to Storage.
 boolean sendToWriter(Line line)
          Put one Line into Storage.
 

方法详细信息

createLine

Line createLine()
Construct one Line of data in Storage which will be used to exchange data.

返回：
a new Line.

sendToWriter

boolean sendToWriter(Line line)
Put one Line into Storage.

参数：
line - Line of data pushed into Storage.
返回：
true for OK, false for failure.

fakeSendToWriter

boolean fakeSendToWriter(int lineLength)
For test

flush

void flush()
Flush data in buffer (if exists) to Storage.
